course_description: This is an advanced-level seminar on contemporary marketing issues with significant global content. This course provides in-depth learning of new marketing paradigms and practices, especially the impact of global competition and the growth of emerging markets. The course is less historic and more futuristic in its orientation.
prerequisites: MKT 340 or SPECSTUBUS students or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.This section is reserved for students in the BBA program.
sections: Class Nbr: 2165, Section #: 1101, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 2:30-3:45p, Instructor: J. Sheth, Status: Open
